name: Ryan Bryden
summary: Ryan Bryden is a seasoned professional specializing in go-to-market (GTM) strategies and outbound marketing, with a focus on leveraging AI-driven technology to build sales pipelines for B2B companies.
work_history:
Apex Ascension: Chief Growth Officer (June 2024 - Present) - Currently serving as the Chief Growth Officer, focusing on strategic growth initiatives.
Breakout Creatives: Founder (October 2023 - Present) - Founded Breakout Creatives, a company that assists B2B companies in building sales pipelines using outbound, AI-driven technology, and GTM strategy.
Odyssey Painting & Services: Co-Founder (January 2022 - September 2022) - Co-founded a summer painting company specializing in interior and exterior paint jobs and finishes, along with providing services like deck staining and fence upkeep.
project_history: Founded Breakout Creatives, a company focused on enhancing B2B sales pipelines through innovative outbound and AI-driven strategies.
skills: Go-to-Market Strategy, Cold Email, Lead Generation
education:
Western University: Bachelor of Business Administration - BBA in Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services (September 2021 - April 2025)
St. Andrew's College: Attended from 2017 to 2021
